data.title: Famous Birthdays on May 26
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 26th of May. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on May 26.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 208

Prince Koreyasu, 7th Japanese shogun, born in Kamakura, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan (d. 1326)
